name: Virtual Sports
description: Experience ping-pong and tennis with realism only possible on the Vive. Play with friends, jump into a quick game online, or tackle career mode versus a spectrum of opponents in far ranging venues. Challenge your skills with realistic physics, or play in Fun Mode to get a boost in accuracy while you learn.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
